queries.querystring:
select distinct is_c1.TABLE_NAME as table1, is_c1.COLUMN_NAME as field1, is_c2.TABLE_NAME as table2, is_c2.COLUMN_NAME as field2 from `dbnode`.`local_joins` as lj force INDEX (table1,table2) left join information_schema.columns AS is_c1 ON lj.table1 like is_c1.TABLE_NAME AND lj.field1 like is_c1.COLUMN_NAME AND is_c1.TABLE_SCHEMA='dbnode' left join information_schema.columns AS is_c2 ON lj.table2 like is_c2.TABLE_NAME AND lj.field2 like is_c2.COLUMN_NAME AND is_c2.TABLE_SCHEMA='dbnode' where ( lj.table1 like '@TableName1'
and lj.table2 like '@TableName2') having table1 is not null and field1 is not null and table2 is not null and field2 is not null
